meanings.sent1: She accidentally bit her underlips while eating.
meanings.sent2: His underlips quivered with emotion as he spoke.
meanings.sent3: The underlips of the puppy were so cute when it tried to lick its nose.
meanings.sent4: Her underlips were a gateway to her true feelings, always revealing her emotions.
meanings.sent5: The underlips were chapped from the cold wind, making them sore and sensitive.

meanings.definition: To place something beneath the lips.
meanings.sent1: She would underlips the spoon to taste the soup.
meanings.sent2: He underlips the straw to take a sip of his drink.
meanings.sent3: The magician underlips the coin before making it disappear.
meanings.sent4: She underlips the microphone before starting her speech.
meanings.sent5: He underlips the pen cap absentmindedly while thinking.

meanings.sent1: Her underlips piercing was a unique addition to her look.
meanings.sent2: The underlips tattoo was subtle but added a touch of edginess.
meanings.sent3: The underlips piercing made her feel like a rebel.
meanings.sent4: The underlips lipstick shade complemented her skin tone perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The underlips freckle added a charming detail to her face.
